function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High probability of individuals having a body temperature lower than 37.5 \tC","Impact":"Potential for individuals with lower body temperature to go undetected and spread contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement additional screening measures alongside temperature checks","Technologies":"Thermal imaging cameras for temperature screening","People":"Individuals attending the mass vaccination clinic","Owner":"Health authorities or event organizers"},{"Description":"Limited space for mass vaccination clinic","Impact":"Inability to accommodate a large number of people leading to crowding and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Optimize clinic layout and processes to maximize space utilization","Technologies":"Efficient queue management systems and space utilization software","People":"Public attending the mass vaccination clinic","Owner":"Health authorities or event organizers"},{"Description":"Inadequate anamnesis and rejection probability","Impact":"Increased risk of allowing individuals with potential contagious diseases to enter the clinic","Mitigation":"Implement thorough screening processes and training for staff","Technologies":"Electronic health records and screening apps","People":"Individuals attending the mass vaccination clinic","Owner":"Health authorities or event organizers"}]}
